bibl.title: Textiles from Antinoupolis: Recent Finds from the so Called Peristyle Complex in the Northern Necropolis.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Discovery in the late 19th century. - Excavation missions in the 20th century. - The so called ""peristyle complex"". - Textiles equipment of a baby. - Textile equipment of a little boy's burial. - Textiles from the burial of a naked boy. - Dress accessories. - Hairnets in sprang technique. - Wreaths. - An extended cap. - Pouches. - Textiles from the tomb of Tgol. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Itinerari mediterranei tra VI e IX secolo. Città-capitale e deserto-monastico. Atti del Convegno

bibl.seg: Cäcilia Fluck, Textiles from Antinoupolis: Recent Finds from the so Called Peristyle Complex in the Northern Necropolis.

Beatrice Astrua (ed.), Itinerari mediterranei tra VI e IX secolo. Città-capitale e deserto-monastico. Atti del Convegno = Collana di studi del Centro interdipartimentale di scienze religiose - Università di Torino. 5 (Torino, 2013) pp. 85-104; - 75-77, 4 pll. n./bl. et 3 pll. coul.

Introduction. - Discovery in the late 19th century. - Excavation missions in the 20th century. - The so called ""peristyle complex"". - Textiles equipment of a baby. - Textile equipment of a little boy's burial. - Textiles from the burial of a naked boy. - Dress accessories. - Hairnets in sprang technique. - Wreaths. - An extended cap. - Pouches. - Textiles from the tomb of Tgol. - Conclusion.
